alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 14 at 8:24PM PST until December 15 at 12:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 9 AM WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, areas of west winds 20 to 30 mph. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and San Diego County Valleys. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Inland Valleys
